Class AssistantCardPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node

it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.AutoCleanableAnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.rescale.RescalableAnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.assistants.AssistantCardPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaFXRescalable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class AssistantCardPane extends RescalableAnchorPane
A rescalable anchor pane that displays assistant cards, with support for clicks
